body_html: FWIW, without this change I got an unresolved symbol error when linking the C++ tests, failing on undefined reference to gloo::pciDistance(std::string const&, std::string const&) which is defined in the gloo library.
body_text: FWIW, without this change I got an unresolved symbol error when linking the C++ tests, failing on undefined reference to gloo::pciDistance(std::string const&, std::string const&) which is defined in the gloo library.
body: FWIW, without this change I got an unresolved symbol error when linking the C++ tests, failing on `undefined reference to gloo::pciDistance(std::string const&, std::string const&)` which is defined in the `gloo` library.
